summary: The diff fully implements REQ-1. The Nav.tsx component was modified to add an external link to https://reflect-and-create.lovable.app/ that opens in a new tab with proper security attributes (target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'). The link is visible in both desktop and mobile navigation layouts, using a Button component with 'Reflect & Create' label and an ExternalLink icon. No missing requirements or hallucinated features were identified.
